Test scenario:
Verifing the continue button
with valid data in
 Registration Page.
Test case Id:
TC001_HomePage_
RegisterPage_Create an
 Account_BasicDetails_
valid data
Testcase Description:
This test case is to verify 
Basic Details
module with valid 
data
Steps to Reproduce:
Enter valid URL and 
click on search button
Expected Result:
It should open IRCTC
main page

Steps to Reproduce:
In main page click on 
Register icon
Expected Result:
IT should open Register
page with "Create your 
Account module"
Actual Result:
Opens Register 
page with "Create
your Account module"

Test Data:
UserName:abcd@abcd@
abcd@abcd@abcd@
abcd@abcd@
password:Gayatri@2199
confirm password:
Gayatri@2199
Security Answer:Dog
Steps to Reproduce:
1.In Username field 
enter valid data
2.In pasword field enter
valid data
3.In confirm password
field enter valid data(i.e,
repeat the same password) 
4.select any perferred language
5.select any security question
6.enter valid security answer.
7.click on continue button
Expected Result:
It should take valid data
and direct to personal 
details page
Actual Result:
Not Taking Valid data(
i.e, 35 characters). It is 
taking only 30 
characters
